message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it for $13,000?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $11,500, but I'm not going any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate you moving closer to my budget, Alice. How about we split the difference and meet at $10,750?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11,500 and $10,750, so I can offer it to you for $11,125. Is that something you'd be interested in?
